description.zh-cn: 清朝道光帝的第三位嫡妻，即位后所立的第二位皇后，咸丰帝的生母。
description.en: The third principal consort of the Daoguang Emperor of the Qing Dynasty, the second empress established after his enthronement, and the birth mother of the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第八位皇帝，庙号宣宗，孝全成皇后的丈夫。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, with the temple name Xuanzong, and the husband of Empress Xiaoquancheng.

description.zh-cn: 孝全成皇后的父亲，官至干清门二等侍卫，赠三等承恩公。
description.en: Father of Empress Xiaoquancheng, served as a second-class imperial bodyguard of the Gate of Heavenly Purity and was posthumously granted the title of Third-class Duke Cheng'en.

description.zh-cn: 孝全成皇后的母亲，颐龄的嫡妻。
description.en: Mother of Empress Xiaoquancheng, the principal wife of Yiling.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，道光帝第四子，孝全成皇后的独子。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, the fourth son of the Daoguang Emperor, and the only son of Empress Xiaoquancheng.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝第三女，孝全成皇后所生，早夭。
description.en: The third daughter of the Daoguang Emperor, born to Empress Xiaoquancheng, who died young.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝第四女，孝全成皇后所生。
description.en: The fourth daughter of the Daoguang Emperor, born to Empress Xiaoquancheng.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝的皇贵妃，咸丰帝的养母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Daoguang Emperor and the adoptive mother of the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝，道光帝的父亲。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing Dynasty, father of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆帝的皇后，道光帝的生母。
description.en: Empress of the Jiaqing Emperor and the birth mother of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆帝的第二位皇后，道光帝的养母。
description.en: The second empress of the Jiaqing Emperor and the adoptive mother of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古亲王世子，寿安固伦公主的丈夫。
description.en: Heir Apparent of a Mongol Prince, husband of Princess Shou'an Gurun.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由满族建立的君主制王朝。
description.en: A Manchu-led monarchy in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪中期英国对中国发动的侵略战争。
description.en: An aggressive war launched by Britain against China in the mid-19th century.

description.zh-cn: 孝全成皇后去世后，年仅十岁的奕𬣞由静贵妃（孝静成皇后）抚养。
description.en: After the death of Empress Xiaoquancheng, the ten-year-old Yizhu was raised by Noble Consort Jing (Empress Xiaojingcheng).

description.zh-cn: 孝和睿皇后是道光帝的养母。
description.en: Empress Xiaoherui was the adoptive mother of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 于道光十四年（1834年）被册封为皇后，直至1840年去世。
description.en: She was enthroned as Empress in the 14th year of Daoguang (1834) and held the title until her death in 1840.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝在面对鸦片战争的巨大压力时，仍然坚持为孝全成皇后举办了盛大的葬礼。
description.en: Despite being under great pressure from the Opium War, the Daoguang Emperor insisted on holding a grand funeral for Empress Xiaoquancheng.
